turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Eldest.
turn.1: What is the Pre-Age in relation to Eragon and Saphira?
turn.2: Both efforts fail miserably, but bring Eragon and Saphira closer together.
turn.3: What do you find interesting about the Pre-Age?
turn.4: Later, at the ancient elven ceremony, the Agaetí Blödhren (Blood-Oath Celebration), Eragon is altered by a spectral dragon.
turn.5: How is Eragon altered by the spectral dragon?
turn.6: The changes alter his senses, and enhance his abilities, effectively turning him into an elf-human hybrid, as well as healing all of his wounds, scars, and back injury.
turn.7: What happens after he is healed?
turn.8: Reinvigorated, Eragon continues training until he learns that the Empire will soon attack the Varden in Surda.
turn.9: Is Eragon ready for the attack?
turn.10: Afterward he confesses his feelings for Arya who rejects him harshly.
turn.11: What does he do after Arya rejects him?
turn.12: Dismayed, he leaves without completing his training, to aid the Varden in battle.
